name: Rabbitra 2
description:
Your enemies is a kind of alien which came with the meteorites from outer space called "KABI". "KABI" learn and listen, they want to be the most annoying thing for human and wreaking havoc.

Since "KABI" now is special species in the LAND, no one wanted to take the responsibility to "CLEAN" it. People had no choice and start seeking help from "Rabbitra Cleaning Company" to "CLEAN" the "KABI" in traditional way. Due to limited manpower, please join Rabbitra and do your best to clean the land.


Combined horizontal shooting and endless runner, "Clean" the enemies with "traditional" gameplay style.


Try to buy items to help you "clean" more enemies and challenge for higher scores. Save the world (if you want).
